Test Reviewer: HTML and math support.content:
We have custom CSS:
Hello! This is made with the class noteThemeOrange.
Also math support: $x=\frac13$ and $$\sum^\infty_{i=1}\frac1{i^2}=\frac{\pi^2}6.$$ Kinda cool, right?

This page will likely soon be updated with actual documentation.
